name: Userstyles.org Clean Dark Green
description:
This makes userstyles.org look clean, geen and mean! This theme will use Calibri if available, if not Trebuchet Ms, you can also choose fonts.
Have fun. (Firefox 4+ only I think)
(I'm very busy so may not be able to respond to questions.)

Please atttribute this to me if you are using it for anything. (See Licence)
